Description: Glazed composition game-piece; marbled blue and black glaze.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1991 BM, G88, 'Board Games around the World' 2012 July - September, Tokyo, Mori museum, The Book of the Dead: Journey Through the Afterlife 2012, October - November, Fukuoka Museum of Art, The Book of the Dead 2013, May - September, Perth, Western Australian Museum, The Book of the Dead
